brf_accessories.name: vitamins for mom
brf_accessories.cmt: you may continue your daily prenatals

brf_accessories.name: vitamins for baby
brf_accessories.note: breastmilk contains little Vitamin D, which is synthesized by the infant in the presence of sunlight. For the indoor dwelling baby, once eating solid food, replace this with a multi with iron

brf_accessories.name: pure lanolin wax
brf_accessories.note: very soothing, babysafe, but will stain clothes

brf_accessories.name: OTC pain relief
brf_accessories.note: have it on hand, but check type with your PCP/OBGYN

brf_accessories.name: nursing pillow
brf_accessories.cmt: helps to support infant during feeding
brf_accessories.note: great for newborns, great for learning to sit

bof_accessories.name: breastpump, manual and/or electric
bof_accessories.cmt: get your insurance to provide an electric, and purchase a manual for casual use
bof_accessories.note: if you aren't working away from your baby, a manual is likely to satisfy your needs

bof_accessories.name: milk storage containers
bof_accessories.cmt: e.g. freezer bags, fridge capped cups
bof_accessories.note: up to 3d in fridge, 3m in freezer, 1y in deep freeze

bof_accessories.name: bottles
bof_accessories.cmt: glass is hygienic and will last through many children
bof_accessories.note: don't buy a lot of one kind until you know he likes it

bof_accessories.name: bottle brush, sterilizer
bof_accessories.cmt: without a sterilizer, boil 5+ min to sterilize
bof_accessories.note: germaphobe or not, bottles and toys should be sterilized on first use and as needed, but at least quarterly

clothes.name: fun bodysuits (6)
clothes.cmt: every baby needs a few bright colors and patterns

clothes.name: socks (20)
clothes.cmt: these will get lost - wash them in a laundry bag and give up on matching them

clothes.name: kimonos (2)
clothes.cmt: classic cotton - no frills clothing for tiny, new babies

clothes.name: baby bag (indoor)
clothes.cmt: polyester will make for warm winter naps

clothes.name: baby bag (outdoor)
clothes.cmt: water/snow proof, buy one with a hole for carseat straps

linens.name: Tide Powder
linens.cmt: I have not found anything else that works as well on baby stains

linens.name: clean-up cloths (30)
linens.cmt: squirrel away small scraps everywhere to wipe up bits of drool

linens.name: nail clippers (2)
linens.cmt: baby nails are sharp and grow fast! get a spare.
